sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RESSORT a Ftench word, ſometimes uſed by En-gliſh authors to ſignify the juriſdiction of a court, and particularly one from which there is no appeal. — Thus it is ſaid, that the houſe of lords judge en dernier reffort, or in the laſt reffυrt.
